profileText: a Representative from New York; born in Bay Shore, Suffolk County, N.Y., June 23, 1978; graduated from St. Anthony’s High School, South Huntington, N.Y.; B.S., United States Naval Academy, Annapolis, Md., 2000; M.B.A., Hofstra University, Hempstead, N.Y., 2012; J.D., Hofstra University, Hempstead, N.Y., 2020; United States Navy, 2000-2007; stockbroker; staff, United States Representative Steve Israel, 2009-2010; staff, New York state senate; staff, New York state senator Phil Boyle, member of the village of Amityville, N.Y., board of trustees; commissioner, Suffolk County, N.Y., board of elections; staff, Suffolk County, N.Y. legislature; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-present).
